title: Drawing, "George C. and Eleanor Hutton Rand Apartment: Kitchen and Bathroom", May 15, 1934
medium: Graphite and red color pencil on tracing paper, ruled border in graphite
markings: Stamp in black ink, lower right: DONALD DESKEY/145 WEST 57TH STREET/NEW YORK CITY
inscribed: Inscribed in graphite in stamp, lower right: 1/2"=1'0"/WESTERVELD/ 5/15/34; dimensions and instructions in graphite
description: Plan and elevations for kitchen. Entrance on north wall in semi-enclosed entry space. Refrigerator, overhead cabinet unit on east wall near door. Stove to right of refrigerator with overhead cabinets. Table and door or window against south wall. Sink on west wall, overhead cabinet above. Lavatory on west wall, with entrance on north side. Toilet and small sink in lavatory.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "George C. and Eleanor Hutton Rand Apartment: Kitchen and Bathroom", May 15, 1934.
May 15, 1934. Graphite and red color pencil on tracing paper, ruled border in graphite. Gift of Donald Deskey. 1975-11-514.
